robowars
Class BulletHitEvent

java.lang.Object
  robowars.AbstractEvent
      robowars.BulletHitEvent
public final class BulletHitEvent
extends AbstractEvent

Represents bullet hitting a robot. An object of this class is passed to the event handler routine onBulletHit.

Method Summary
 Bullet getBullet()
          returns the bullet.
 double getOtherRobotHealth()
          returns the health of the Robot that was hit.
 java.lang.String getOtherRobotName()
          returns the name of the Robot that was hit.
